notes: updates to peer dependencies and including theme support in package
features: Updated peer dependencies to specify less specific versions
DxTextbox - added clearOnEscape option to disable esc key behavior
DxAccordion - support controlling open state programmatically
DxButton - support "link" button type that looks like a text link
DxAccordion - support interactivity and additional heading formatting options
DxItemGroup - support providing item values, i.e. value binding

bugfixes: DxItemGroup - refined selection/eventing behavior for radio group

features: Added support for multiline DxTextbox (i.e. textarea)
bugfixes: DxTextbox - fix initialValue vs. value bug

features: Added support for updating items collection in DxItemGroup

bugfixes: Fix DxItemGroup to raise events for all display formats

notes: This release contains several improvements to the components
features: Support disabled property on all input-type components
Support className property on all components
Support 'controlled component' behavior to update internal state when the property value (or checked for checkboxes) is updated
bugfixes: Fix radio input button style to show as radio button instead of checkmark

notes: This release predates tracking release notes
